fields.description:
Big 5 Sporting Goods (BGFV), one of the largest sporting goods retailers in the Western US, has seen a rebound in their business, which was hurt hard during the recession because of the regions the company serves, specifically California. Margins troughed for the company in the low 4% range, but have started to turn around, and should return back to the company's historic 6-8% range. This margin expansion creates a minimum 40% upside in the stock going forward. Margin expansion is further supported by a new store concept, favorable lease negotiations, and higher-end (higher-margin) products. BGFV will also enter the e-commerce area in 2014.The company has a "margin of safety" in the fact that even without margin expansion, the company trades at a deep discount to its competition on today's multiples, due in part to an over-blown, recent sell-off after the company's latest quarterly call. As we will talk about later in this article, BGFV's differentiated business model and regional focus also insulates the company from competition.Differentiated Store BaseOne thing that really interests me about BGFV is the location of the store base - the company focuses on the west coast. Here's a breakdown of the current store base by state:(click to enlarge)We see that over 50% of the store base is located in California. Because of this, the company was hurt pretty hard during the recession, but we have seen a strong rebound in CA, which provides more upside for BGFV going forward.Also, this west coast focus creates isolation against competition. Dick's Sporting Goods (DKS) has only 26 stores (5% of total store base) in California. Hibbett Sports (HIBB) has no presence (see below) in California, and Modell's is only located in the Northeast US. BGFV lists these companies as its major competition!Source: HIBB PresentationThe company has big upside from its presence in CA, and is isolated from competition because of the regions it focuses on.Differentiated store sizeAnother point of differentiation for BGFV is its store size. With an average size of 11,000 square feet, the stores are bigger than an average HIBB unit (5,000 square feet), but much smaller than the DKS concept (50,000 square feet). After following the sporting goods space for several years, my opinion is that this middle-size is perfect - big enough to be off-mall and carry more sporting equipment, but not as big as DKS (there has been some contention over the last year as to the viability of DKS growing to 900 stores if they plan of keeping the store size this big).New store concepts will be smaller, but still fit inside this mid-size concept.New Store ConceptsThe company has been testing a new, smaller store concept. The units have a lower upfront investment ($900K) and have average cash-on-cash returns of 24%. The New concepts also have higher margins (average operating margins of 12%) than the overall store base, which provides further support to the margin expansion story.E-Commerce LaunchSurprisingly, the company has no e-commerce platform as of today. Currently, you can only visit the BGFV website and find the closest store to purchase the item you are looking for.The company has been investing an e-commerce platform, which will launch in 2014. This should be another lever for growth for the company.Recent Sell-off - Q2 EarningsSo far we have a differentiated business model that faces only a small amount of competition from the other major sporting goods retailers. We also have a very interesting margin expansion story. Now, all we need is a good entry price. Lucky for us, we recently received this entry point after a sell-off due to the company's latest earnings call.The stock was sold off on the call for two major reasons, which I highlight below (along with my reason why the concerns were overblown):The company had been repurchasing shares, but stopped in the latest quarter. Also, when asked, theair max 87 company guided for flat share count for the rest of the year. (The company has been aggressively paying down debt, and I took the comment for the rest of the year as conservative, as many company tell analysts to model flat share count when they in fact plan on repurchasing shares)Guidance is for the smallest margin increase the company has had in some time (they are comping against the strongest 3rd quarter in the company's history as a public company)I was actually quite impressed by the quarter. Highlights of the call included:Promotional activity decreased in the quarter (this is really good news compared to most of the retail industry)There has been a strong start to Q3Slight improvements in customer traffic and a mid-single-digit increase in average ticketSame-store sales improved for each of the major product category (apparel, footwear and hardgoods)So now we have a strong business model and good entry point. Let's get into detail about the most compelling part of the story - margin expansion.Operating Margins - An Opportunity for Mean ReversionOver the past two years, the company's operating margins have fallen into mid 4% range. Over the longer-term, the company's margins have usually fallen in the 6-8% range. Management believes that margins will return to the historical range based on the following:New store concepts have 12% operating marginsSales leverage as the California/west coast rebound continuesIncreasing merchandise margins - there has been a focus to sell higher-end, higher margins products. This push to higher-end products also further insulates the company against competition from Wal-Mart (WMT) and Target (TGT) (BGFV's 10-K lists the big box retailers as competition)Favorable real estate costs - management noted that as leases have come up for renewal, they have been able to get more favorable terms (specifically in California).Company is closing underperforming storesE-commerce platform spend goes away next year - the company stated that investment in the e-commerce platform will equal $.05 to $.06 of lower EPS in 2013 because of the increased SG&AWhat's more, if you look at the trailing twelve months of performance, margins have returned to the low end (6.4%) of the range already (even though they are only in the 4.8% range for the last six months).OutlookThe company will do about $1B of revenue on average over the next two years (estimates are for just over $1B with a small range of $1.03-1.09B by seven analysts). Let's take a look at projections assuming no revenue growth and using the 6-8% operating margin range: LowHigh Revenue ($'000s)$1,000$1,000 Operating Profit$60$80 Net Income$1.57$2.10 Free Cash Flow$36MM$48MM FCF Yield9.5%12.7% EBITDA$82MM$102MM EV/EBITDA5.1x4.1xNote: Capex is at abnormally high levels in 2013 as the company invests in the e-commerce platform and distribution center. 2014 will see a reduction, which will increase free cash flow and allow for more dividends/share repurchases/debt paydowns.We can see as margins return to their normal levels, the stock becomes very cheap. Since the company will grow stores by 6% this year, the launch of the e-commerce platform in 2014, and the fact that there should be some upside in revenue as the west coast rebounds, these estimates could end up being conservative.A look at the competition's operating margins (DKS around 8% and HIBB around 12%) provides further support to management's 6-8% target.Balance SheetThe company has been aggressively using its free cash flow to��� pay down debt, from $77MM last year to $44MM today. This brings up a strong point - even though the company was at trough margins, it was still producing positive free cash flow.The company has also been using excess free cash to repurchase shares (the decline in purchases was part of the sell-off in the latest quarter). The company also has $6MM in cash and a revolver to fund operations.The company pays a dividend of $.10/quarter (2.4% yield). I expect this dividend to increase to about $.12/quarter next year.ValuationWe have seen what earnings could look like as margins return to normal levels, now let's take a look at the current valuation of BGFV compared to its competition: P/EEV/EBITDAEV/Sales DKS15.0x9.0x1.0x BGFV11.0x9.0x0.5x HIBB15.5x10.0x1.5xWe see that even though BGFV is currently operating below normal margins, the company trades at a deep discount to its competition on today's multiples. Is this justified? Maybe during the recession, considering the markets BGFV serves, but we have seen a rebound in BGFV's regions (specifically in California) and see a path to margin expansion and EBITDA growth. I would expect that the multiples expand in the near-term, closer to the competitions' multiples. Using an average of 0.75x sales and 14.0x earnings, we get a price target of $24 (about a 40% premium to the current price). I believe these multiples are fair because the company should trade at a discount to its competitors, considering the aggressive growth expansion of the other two names.If we use the high and low end of the future outlook range (see outlook section above), assuming minimal revenue growth and margin expansion to normal ranges, we get a price target range of $24-$30 (40-75% upside - note this valuation range is based on a blend valuation of free cash flow (8% yield), EV/EBITDA (8.0x), and EPS (14.0x)).RisksRisks for the company include:Inability to continue improvement in marginsSensitivity to California economyPoor weather can have a large impact on salesCatalystsCatalysts for the company include:Increased sell-side coverage - on the latest quarterly call, there were only three sell-side analysts (and two buy-side analysts) on the call. Increased coverage could increase demand for the stockFurther margin expansion to the 6-8% target rangeStore expansion - the company will open 15 new stores this yearStrong results at new store conceptsStrong results from remodelsIncreased sales from a continued west coast reboundIncreased sales from the company's entry into e-commerceConclusionAfter a recent, overblown sell-off, investors have been given the opportunity to buy BGFV at a steep discount to its competition. The margin-expansion story has already begun, and will be further supported by new store concepts, higher margin projects, and a rebound in California. The company is isolated from major competition by its focus on the west coast, and should see revenue growth as it launches an e-commerce platform. I believe there is a minimum 40% upside in the name from its current price, and am encouraging investors to buy the stock with an intermediate-term target of $24, and a longer-term target of $30.
Disclosure: I have no positions in any stocks mentioned, and no plans to initiate any positions within the next 72 hours. I wrote this article myself, and it expresses my own opinions. I am not receiving compensation for it (other than from Seeking Alpha). I have no business relationship with any company whose stock is mentioned in this article. (More...)

With an average size of 11,000 square feet, the stores are bigger than an average HIBB unit (5,000 square feet), but much smaller than the DKS concept (50,000 square feet). After following the sporting goods space for several years, my opinion is that this middle-size is perfect - big enough to be off-mall and carry more sporting equipment, but not as big as DKS (there has been some contention over the last year as to the viability of DKS growing to 900 stores if they plan of keeping the store size this big).New store concepts will be smaller, but still fit inside this mid-size concept.New Store ConceptsThe company has been testing a new, smaller store concept. The units have a lower upfront investment ($900K) and have average cash-on-cash returns of 24%. The New concepts also have higher margins (average operating margins of 12%) than the overall store base, which provides further support to the margin expansion story.E-Commerce LaunchSurprisingly, the company has no e-commerce platform as of today. Currently, you can only visit the BGFV website and find the closest store to purchase the item you are looking for.The company has been investing an e-commerce platform, which will launch in 2014. This should be another lever for growth for the company.Recent Sell-off - Q2 EarningsSo far we have a differentiated business model that faces only a small amount of competition from the other major sporting goods retailers. We also have a very interesting margin expansion story. Now, all we need is a good entry price. Lucky for us, we recently received this entry point after a sell-off due to the company's latest earnings call.The stock was sold off on the call for two major reasons, which I highlight below (along with my reason why the concerns were overblown):The company had been repurchasing shares, but stopped in the latest quarter. Also, when asked, theair max 87 company guided for flat share count for the rest of the year. (The company has been aggressively paying down debt, and I took the comment for the rest of the year as conservative, as many company tell analysts to model flat share count when they in fact plan on repurchasing shares)Guidance is for the smallest margin increase the company has had in some time (they are comping against the strongest 3rd quarter in the company's history as a public company)I was actually quite impressed by the quarter. Highlights of the call included:Promotional activity decreased in the quarter (this is really good news compared to most of the retail industry)There has been a strong start to Q3Slight improvements in customer traffic and a mid-single-digit increase in average ticketSame-store sales improved for each of the major product category (apparel, footwear and hardgoods)So now we have a strong business model and good entry point. Let's get into detail about the most compelling part of the story - margin expansion.Operating Margins - An Opportunity for Mean ReversionOver the past two years, the company's operating margins have fallen into mid 4% range. Over the longer-term, the company's margins have usually fallen in the 6-8% range. Management believes that margins will return to the historical range based on the following:New store concepts have 12% operating marginsSales leverage as the California/west coast rebound continuesIncreasing merchandise margins - there has been a focus to sell higher-end, higher margins products. This push to higher-end products also further insulates the company against competition from Wal-Mart (WMT) and Target (TGT) (BGFV's 10-K lists the big box retailers as competition)Favorable real estate costs - management noted that as leases have come up for renewal, they have been able to get more favorable terms (specifically in California).Company is closing underperforming storesE-commerce platform spend goes away next year - the company stated that investment in the e-commerce platform will equal $.05 to $.06 of lower EPS in 2013 because of the increased SG&AWhat's more, if you look at the trailing twelve months of performance, margins have returned to the low end (6.4%) of the range already (even though they are only in the 4.8% range for the last six months).OutlookThe company will do about $1B of revenue on average over the next two years (estimates are for just over $1B with a small range of $1.03-1.09B by seven analysts). Let's take a look at projections assuming no revenue growth and using the 6-8% operating margin range: LowHigh Revenue ($'000s)$1,000$1,000 Operating Profit$60$80 Net Income$1.57$2.10 Free Cash Flow$36MM$48MM FCF Yield9.5%12.7% EBITDA$82MM$102MM EV/EBITDA5.1x4.1xNote: Capex is at abnormally high levels in 2013 as the company invests in the e-commerce platform and distribution center. 2014 will see a reduction, which will increase free cash flow and allow for more dividends/share repurchases/debt paydowns.We can see as margins return to their normal levels, the stock becomes very cheap. Since the company will grow stores by 6% this year, the launch of the e-commerce platform in 2014, and the fact that there should be some upside in revenue as the west coast rebounds, these estimates could end up being conservative.A look at the competition's operating margins (DKS around 8% and HIBB around 12%) provides further support to management's 6-8% target.Balance SheetThe company has been aggressively using its free cash flow to��� pay down debt, from $77MM last year to $44MM today. This brings up a strong point - even though the company was at trough margins, it was still producing positive free cash flow.The company has also been using excess free cash to repurchase shares (the decline in purchases was part of the sell-off in the latest quarter). The company also has $6MM in cash and a revolver to fund operations.The company pays a dividend of $.10/quarter (2.4% yield). I expect this dividend to increase to about $.12/quarter next year.ValuationWe have seen what earnings could look like as margins return to normal levels, now let's take a look at the current valuation of BGFV compared to its competition: P/EEV/EBITDAEV/Sales DKS15.0x9.0x1.0x BGFV11.0x9.0x0.5x HIBB15.5x10.0x1.5xWe see that even though BGFV is currently operating below normal margins, the company trades at a deep discount to its competition on today's multiples. Is this justified? Maybe during the recession, considering the markets BGFV serves, but we have seen a rebound in BGFV's regions (specifically in California) and see a path to margin expansion and EBITDA growth. I would expect that the multiples expand in the near-term, closer to the competitions' multiples. Using an average of 0.75x sales and 14.0x earnings, we get a price target of $24 (about a 40% premium to the current price). I believe these multiples are fair because the company should trade at a discount to its competitors, considering the aggressive growth expansion of the other two names.If we use the high and low end of the future outlook range (see outlook section above), assuming minimal revenue growth and margin expansion to normal ranges, we get a price target range of $24-$30 (40-75% upside - note this valuation range is based on a blend valuation of free cash flow (8% yield), EV/EBITDA (8.0x), and EPS (14.0x)).RisksRisks for the company include:Inability to continue improvement in marginsSensitivity to California economyPoor weather can have a large impact on salesCatalystsCatalysts for the company include:Increased sell-side coverage - on the latest quarterly call, there were only three sell-side analysts (and two buy-side analysts) on the call. Increased coverage could increase demand for the stockFurther margin expansion to the 6-8% target rangeStore expansion - the company will open 15 new stores this yearStrong results at new store conceptsStrong results from remodelsIncreased sales from a continued west coast reboundIncreased sales from the company's entry into e-commerceConclusionAfter a recent, overblown sell-off, investors have been given the opportunity to buy BGFV at a steep discount to its competition. The margin-expansion story has already begun, and will be further supported by new store concepts, higher margin projects, and a rebound in California. The company is isolated from major competition by its focus on the west coast, and should see revenue growth as it launches an e-commerce platform. I believe there is a minimum 40% upside in the name from its current price, and am encouraging investors to buy the stock with an intermediate-term target of $24, and a longer-term target of $30.
Disclosure: I have no positions in any stocks mentioned, and no plans to initiate any positions within the next 72 hours. I wrote this article myself, and it expresses my own opinions. I am not receiving compensation for it (other than from Seeking Alpha). I have no business relationship with any company whose stock is mentioned in this article. (More...)

What will be lymphatic filariasis?

Lymphatic filariasis can always be a parasitic disease caused by microscopic, thread-like worms. The Particular adult worms just reside in the human lymph system. Your lymph system maintains the body's fluid stability and fights infections.

Lymphatic filariasis affects more than 120 million folks within 73 countries throughout the tropics as well as sub-tropics associated with Asia, Africa, the particular Western Pacific, and also elements of the Caribbean and also South America. you cannot acquire infected with the worms in the United States.

How is lymphatic filariasis spread?

The disease spreads from individual for you to person through mosquito bites. Any time a mosquito bites any individual that has lymphatic filariasis, microscopic worms circulating within the person's blood get into and also infect the particular mosquito. people get lymphatic filariasis from the bite involving an infected mosquito. Your microscopic worms pass in the mosquito via the skin, and also journey to the lymph vessels. Inside the lymph vessels they develop into adults. An adult worm lives for about 5–7 years. Your adult worms mate and also release an incredible number of microscopic worms, referred to become able to as microfilariae, in to the blood. Individuals using the worms within their blood could provide the infection to other people by means of mosquitoes.

Who will be at a heightened risk with regard to infection?

Repeated mosquito bites more than several months for you to many years are needed to have lymphatic filariasis. Individuals living for any long time in tropical or sub-tropical areas the spot exactly where the disease is common are in your greatest danger for infection. Short-term tourists possess a really low risk. An infection will demonstrate up on the blood test.

What would end up being the signs and signs of lymphatic filariasis?

Most infected individuals are asymptomatic along with will not develop clinical symptoms, despite the undeniable fact that the actual parasite damages the actual lymph system. The small percentage regarding individuals will develop lymphedema. This really is caused by improper functioning in the lymph system in which results in fluid collection as well as swelling. This kind of mostly affects the particular legs, but tend to additionally occur inside the arms, breasts, as well as genitalia. most folks develop these clinical manifestations a extended time following being infected.

The swelling and furthermore the decreased perform of the lymph system ensure it is tough for the physique to fight germs and also infections. Affected individuals will have more bacterial infections inside the skin as well as lymph system. This kind of causes hardening and also thickening in the skin, which could be called elephantiasis. Several of these bacterial infections may be prevented together with proper skin hygiene.

Men could develop hydrocele or swelling of the scrotum due to infection using certainly one of the parasites that triggers LF, particularly W. bancrofti.

Filarial infection could additionally cause tropical pulmonary eosinophilia syndrome. This kind of syndrome is usually seen in infected individuals within Asia. Clinical manifestations of tropical pulmonary eosinophilia syndrome consist of cough, shortness of breath, along with wheezing. the eosinophilia is usually accompanied through higher ranges of IgE (Immunoglobulin E) as well as antifilarial antibodies.

How will be lymphatic filariasis diagnosed?

The regular technique for diagnosing active infection is the identification of microfilariae simply by microscopic examination. This specific is not always feasible because in nearly all elements of your world, microfilariae are nocturnally periodic, this means they only circulate inside the blood from night. for this reason, the particular blood collection provides being completed with night in order to coincide with all the physical appearance in the microfilariae.

Serologic techniques offer an alternative solution for you to microscopic detection regarding microfilariae for that diagnosis associated with lymphatic filariasis. Since lymphedema might develop many a lengthy time following infection, lab tests in many cases are negative using these patients.

How can I stop infection?

Avoiding mosquito bites is the best form of prevention. The Particular mosquitoes that carry the microscopic worms typically bite in between the amount associated with time involving dusk as well as dawn. If you reside throughout or perhaps journey to an area together with lymphatic filariasis:

• Sleep below a mosquito net.

• Wear extended sleeves as well as trousers.

• Use mosquito repellent upon exposed skin between dusk and also dawn.

What may be the therapy for lymphatic filariasis?

People have contracted adult worms may require a yearly dose of medicine, known as diethylcarbamazine (DEC), in which kills the microscopic worms circulating inside the blood. Although this drug will not kill all in the adult worms, it will avoid infected folks coming from giving the condition to a person else.

Lymphedema and elephantiasis aren't indications with regard to DEC treatment method since the vast majority of people with lymphedema aren't actively infected using the filarial parasite. Physicians could obtain DEC coming from CDC following lab outcomes confirm infection.

Even after the adult worms die, lymphedema can easily develop. An Individual could ask your own physician for any referral in order to visit a lymphedema therapist pertaining to specialized care. Stop the particular lymphedema from receiving more serious by simply next numerous basic principles:

• Carefully wash the particular swollen region together with water along with soap each and every day.

• Elevate and exercise the actual swollen arm or leg to go the fluid and improve the lymph flow.

• Disinfect just about any wounds. Use antibacterial as well as antifungal cream if necessary.

Thu Aug 29, 2013 9:10pm EDT


By Sara Webb and Elinor ComlayAMSTERDAM/MEXICO CITY Aug 29 (Reuters) - An independent
foundation tasked with protecting the interests of KPN
shareholders on Thursday moved to block Carlos Slim's proposed
7.2 billion-euro ($9.52-billion) offer for the Dutch telecoms
group, casting doubt over his expansion plans in Europe.Slim's America Movil already holds nearly
30 percent of KPN, but the surprise move by the KPN foundation
against his firm's offer underlines the difficulty the tycoon
faces in extending his telecoms empire outside of Latin America.Set up to protect key national infrastructure when the
former state monopoly was being privatized, the KPN foundation
said it had exercised an option to buy certain shares that will
give it almost 50 percent of KPN's voting stock."The foundation has intervened in this way in order to
safeguard the interests of KPN and its stakeholders, including
shareholders, employees, customers, trade unions and Dutch
society more generally," it said in a statement.The foundation argued that these interests were at risk
because America Movil had not consulted with KPN before
announcing its intention to make a takeover offer.A spokeswoman for America Movil declined to comment.Already the biggest player in Latin America, Slim is looking
for fresh investment opportunities to help turn around slowing
profits at America Movil, as well as regulatory efforts to cut
him down to size in Mexico, where he has long been dominant.America Movil, which acquired its large stake in KPN last
year, earlier this month said it intended to bid for the rest of
the company, offering 2.40 euros a share in cash.Slim, who began 2013 as the world's richest man, could also
try to fight the KPN foundation's move in court."We wouldn't be surprised to see AMX go to (the European
Union) to challenge the authority and legality of the foundation
on the back of this move," said Imari Love, analyst at
Morningstar. "It's clear the foundation is trying to keep KPN
Dutch-owned by using this poison pill, which, in effect, has the
same impact of golden shares, which are illegal."Jorge Negrete, head of telecom think tank Mediatelecom in
Mexico City, said Slim might well be feeling aggrieved."This isn't about business, this seems to me to be clearly
about protecting the European market," he said.FOUNDATIONSAmerica Movil also has theair max 1 option of sitting down to offer a
higher price for the rest of KPN it does not already own.The foundation itself called for more talks to be held."The foundation believes that America Movil should, in
accordance with the rules and what is common practice in the
Netherlands, open negotiations with KPN's Board of Management
and the Dutch government as soon as possible," it said.Still, KPN shares closed down 0.65 percent at 2.28 euros
suggesting that - at least before the foundation's announcement
- not all investors believe a higher offer would be justified.Foundations such as KPN's have been used to try and gain an
advantage in high-profile corporate battles, including luxury
goods maker LVMH's failed hostile takeover of Gucci in
1999 and hedge funds' efforts to replace the board and break up
chip equipment maker ASM International in 2008.Shares of America Movil, initially rose on the foundation's
announcement, reflecting the unpopularity of the KPN investment.
The purchase has so far resulted in billions of pesos in paper
losses for America Movil, Slim's flagship company.TELEFONICA FIGHTA number of analysts believe America Movil offered to buy
the rest of KPN to squeeze more money from Slim's great rival in
Latin America, Spanish company Telefonica, which is
seeking to acquire KPN's German unit, E-Plus.If so, the move paid off: earlier this week, Telefonica
raised its offer by 6 percent to 8.55 billion euros, and it won
America Movil's supportBlogger for the deal.The E-Plus sale will provide cash that will improve KPN's
balance sheet, and although it leaves the company without direct
exposure to Europe's biggest mobile market, it makes America
Movil's 2.40 euro a share offer less attractive, analysts said.In a research note written before the KPN foundation's
announcement, analysts at Sanford Bernstein said: "We think that
KPN could be worth as much as 3 euros per share."Raising the bid would be out of character for billionaire
Slim, who has accumulated a business empire stretching from
retail and financial services to infrastructure and oil and gas
drilling companies by snapping up undervalued firms.Shares of Slim's company ended down 0.16 percent at 12.81
pesos in trading in Mexico on Thursday. KPN's shares closed down
0.65 percent before the foundation's announcement."The fear now will be that Slim will now try to exit - any
sign that he will throw in the towel and sell down his stake
willair max 87 pas che femme hang over the KPN shares," said a person familiar with the
telecoms sector, speaking on condition of anonymity.To do that now would come at a hefty price for Slim, who is
still a good way�s�i�A�� from breaking even on his KPN investment.On average, Slim's telecoms giant paid about 3.24 euros a
share for its Dutch stake, including stock bought as part of a
rights issue by KPN earlier this year.

Dutch-owned by using this poison pill, which, in effect, has the
same impact of golden shares, which are illegal."Jorge Negrete, head of telecom think tank Mediatelecom in
Mexico City, said Slim might well be feeling aggrieved."This isn't about business, this seems to me to be clearly
about protecting the European market," he said.FOUNDATIONSAmerica Movil also has theair max 1 option of sitting down to offer a
higher price for the rest of KPN it does not already own.The foundation itself called for more talks to be held."The foundation believes that America Movil should, in
accordance with the rules and what is common practice in the
Netherlands, open negotiations with KPN's Board of Management
and the Dutch government as soon as possible," it said.Still, KPN shares closed down 0.65 percent at 2.28 euros
suggesting that - at least before the foundation's announcement
- not all investors believe a higher offer would be justified.Foundations such as KPN's have been used to try and gain an
advantage in high-profile corporate battles, including luxury
goods maker LVMH's failed hostile takeover of Gucci in
1999 and hedge funds' efforts to replace the board and break up
chip equipment maker ASM International in 2008.Shares of America Movil, initially rose on the foundation's
announcement, reflecting the unpopularity of the KPN investment.
The purchase has so far resulted in billions of pesos in paper
losses for America Movil, Slim's flagship company.TELEFONICA FIGHTA number of analysts believe America Movil offered to buy
the rest of KPN to squeeze more money from Slim's great rival in
Latin America, Spanish company Telefonica, which is
seeking to acquire KPN's German unit, E-Plus.If so, the move paid off: earlier this week, Telefonica
raised its offer by 6 percent to 8.55 billion euros, and it won
America Movil's supportBlogger for the deal.The E-Plus sale will provide cash that will improve KPN's
balance sheet, and although it leaves the company without direct
exposure to Europe's biggest mobile market, it makes America
Movil's 2.40 euro a share offer less attractive, analysts said.In a research note written before the KPN foundation's
announcement, analysts at Sanford Bernstein said: "We think that
KPN could be worth as much as 3 euros per share."Raising the bid would be out of character for billionaire
Slim, who has accumulated a business empire stretching from
retail and financial services to infrastructure and oil and gas
drilling companies by snapping up undervalued firms.Shares of Slim's company ended down 0.16 percent at 12.81
pesos in trading in Mexico on Thursday. KPN's shares closed down
0.65 percent before the foundation's announcement."The fear now will be that Slim will now try to exit - any
sign that he will throw in the towel and sell down his stake
willair max 87 pas che femme hang over the KPN shares," said a person familiar with the
telecoms sector, speaking on condition of anonymity.To do that now would come at a hefty price for Slim, who is
still a good way�s�i�A�� from breaking even on his KPN investment.On average, Slim's telecoms giant paid about 3.24 euros a
share for its Dutch stake, including stock bought as part of a
rights issue by KPN earlier this year.

fields.description: INDICE HARMONISE DES PRIX À LA CONSOMMATION1  (IHPC) POUR LES PAYS MEMBRES DE L'UEMOA (Base 100 en 1996) DAKAR  Septembre 2008  Lindice  Harmonisé  des  Prix  à  la  Consommation  du  mois  de  septembre  2008  a enregistré  une  augmentation  de  1,8%,  imputable  à  la  croissance  de  4,0%  des  prix  des produits alimentaires et à  la hausse de 2,1% des prix au niveau de  la fonction santé En glissement annuel2, les prix à la consommation se sont accrus de 7,9%  Laccroissement des prix des produits alimentaires et des boissons non alcoolisées est lié à  celui  des  « céréales  non  transformées »  (+20,6%),    des  « poissons  et  autres  produits  frais de  la  pêche »  (+10,1%),  des  « fruits »  (+3,4%)  et  des  « produits  alimentaires  non  classés ailleurs »  (+2,8%)  La  hausse  enregistrée  au  niveau  des  prix  des  céréales  sexplique  par  le plein  effet  de  la  levée  par  lEtat  de  la  subvention  sur  le  riz  et  les  spéculations  sur  ce  produit Sur  un  an,  les  prix  des  céréales  non  transformées  se  sont  accrus  de  65,5%  La  tendance haussière au niveau des prix des poissons  frais  sest poursuivie au mois de  septembre 2008, compte  tenu  de  la  rareté  de  certaines  espèces  au  niveau  des  étals  pendant  lhivernage  au Sénégal  Par  rapport  au  mois  de  septembre  2007,  lindice  de  la  fonction  a  connu  une croissance de 12,9% Les services de  la « santé » se sont renchéris de 2,1% en septembre 2008, en liaison avec le relèvement  de  6,2%  des  prix  des  produits  pharmaceutiques  Par  rapport  à  la  période correspondante en 2007, les prix des services de la santé ont augmenté de 0,9% Le  relèvement mensuel  de  3,6%  des  prix  des  produits  de  nettoyage  et  d'entretien  explique  la hausse de 0,7% des prix de  la  fonction « meubles, articles de ménage et entretien courant du foyer » Les prix de cette fonction ont progressé de 4,9% en glissement annuel Les  fonctions « communications », « loisirs et culture », « enseignement », « restaurants et  hôtels »  et  « biens  et  services  divers »  nont  pas  enregistré  de  variations  sensibles  de prix  en  septembre  2008  Toutefois,  en  glissement  annuel,  à  lexception  des  prix  des  services de  communication  qui  sont  restés  stables,  les  prix  des  autres  fonctions  ont  enregistré  des évolutions contrastées respectivement de 1,6%, +7,9%, +6,3%, et +0,8 Lindice des  « articles d'habillement et chaussures » a  reculé de 0,1% par  rapport au mois daoût 2008 et sest apprécié de 0,7% comparativement au mois de septembre 2007 Les  services  de  « transports »  et  « logement,  eau,  électricité,  gaz  et  autres combustibles » ont enregistré chacun un repli mensuel de 0,2% Cette situation fait suite à la baisse  de  1,2%  des  prix  des  carburants  et  lubrifiants  au  niveau  des  transports  et  à  ceux  des combustibles  solides  (1,1%)  et  du  gaz  (0,9%)  au  niveau  « logement,  eau,  électricité,  gaz  et autres  combustibles »  En  glissement  annuel,  les  prix  des  deux  fonctions  ont  progressé respectivement de +12,9% et +2,8%                                                               1 Publié au plus tard 10 jours après la fin du mois concerné 2 Variation entre les mêmes mois de deux années consécutives © ANSD/DSECN /DSC/ IHPC N° 129  07 octobre 2008 / ISSN 08501459                                                 1/4           La  baisse  mensuelle  de  5,2%  des  prix  des  « stupéfiants »  justifie  le  repli  de  0,7%  des  prix des boissons  alcoolisées,  tabacs  et  stupéfiants  Comparés  à  leur  niveau  de  septembre 2007, les prix de la fonction ont augmenté de +1,5%  Au cours du mois sous revue,  linflation sous  jacente3 sest  inscrite en hausse mensuelle de 0,1%  et  de  3,5%  en  glissement  annuel  Les  prix  des  produits  locaux  et  importés  ont augmenté  de  0,7%  et  5,0%  respectivement  par  rapport  au  mois  daoût  2008  Ils  ont  été majorés respectivement de 5,4% et 15,3% sur douze (12) mois  Tableau 1 : Indice Harmonisé des Prix à la Consommation Base 100 en 1996 Fonctions   (cid:153)  dont postes fields.description: (           INDICE NATIONAL DES PRIX À LA CONSOMMATION  (INPC) (Base 100 en 2008) DAKAR  Juillet 2010   LAgence Nationale de  la  Statistique  et de  la Démographie  (ANSD) publie depuis  janvier 2010,  la note mensuelle  de  lIndice  National  des  Prix  à  la  Consommation  (INPC)  Cet  indice  base  100  en  2008, mesure  lévolution  des  prix  au  plan  national  Les  indices  sont  de  type  Laspeyres  et  les  pondérations sont  issues des dépenses de consommation des ménages  tirées de  lEnquête de Suivi de  la Pauvreté au  Sénégal  de  2005  (ESPS)  Le  champ  couvert  par  lindice  national  des  prix  à  la  consommation  est lensemble  du  pays  découpé  en  zones  écologiques/économiques,  à  savoir  le  Sud,  le  Nord,  le  Centre Nord,  lOuest  et  le  Centre  Sud  Ces  cinq  zones  sont  représentées  respectivement  par  Kolda,  Saint Louis, Diourbel, Dakar et Kaolack La collecte des prix se fait dans les capitales de ces régions LINPC est  publié  selon  la  classification  des  fonctions  de  consommation  des  ménages  à  12  fonctions (COICOP1)  Au  total,  la  méthodologie  est  conforme  à  celle  appliquée  pour  le  calcul  du  nouvel  Indice Harmonisé  des  Prix  à  la  Consommation  (IHPC  base  100  en  2008)  dont  la  couverture  est  limitée  à lagglomération de Dakar  LIndice National des Prix à la Consommation du mois de juillet 2010 a enregistré une hausse de  1,8%,  par  rapport  au  mois  précédent  Cette  évolution  sexplique  principalement  par  le renchérissement  des  « produits  alimentaires  et  boissons  non  alcoolisées »,  des  « biens  et services divers », des « restaurants et hôtels » et des services de « transports »   Les  prix  des « produits  alimentaires,  boissons  non  alcoolisées »  ont  progressé  de  3,3%  en variation  mensuelle,  sous  leffet  du  relèvement  de  ceux  des  « légumes  frais  en  fruits  ou  racine  » (+20,2%),  des  « poissons  frais »  (+11,6%),  des  « légumes  secs  et  oléagineux  »  (+9,2%),  des « légumes  frais  en  feuilles »  (+8,1%),  des  « sels,  épices,  sauces  et  produits  alimentaires  non déclarés ailleurs » (+5,7%), des « autres fruits frais » (+4,3%), des « pains » (+3,4%) et de la viande  de « buf » (+2,6%) La chute de la production maraichère et la rareté des ressources halieutiques, à  la  suite  de  linstallation  de  lhivernage,  sont  à  lorigine  de  lévolution  observée  au  niveau  des légumes  et  des  poissons  Toutefois,  le  repli  des  prix  des  « pâtes  alimentaires  »  (2,8%),  des « farines, semoules et gruaux » (2,5%) et des « huiles » (1,4%) a atténué cette tendance Les  prix  des  «  biens  et  services  divers »  ont  progressé  de  1,5%,  en  liaison  avec  laccroissement de ceux des « articles de bijouterie et d'horlogerie » (+4,2%)  La  hausse  des  prix  des  « restaurants,  cafés  et  établissements  similaires »  (+0,7%)  explique essentiellement celle des prix des « restaurants et hôtels » (+0,6%) Les  services  de « transports »  se  sont appréciés de 0,4% en  variation mensuelle, sous  leffet dun renchérissement  du  « transport  routier  de  passagers »  (+0,9%)  et  du  « transport  aérien  de passagers » (+0,4%) Lappréciation  des  prix  des  services  de  « santé »  (+0,2%)  est  consécutive  à  celle  des  prix  des « médicaments traditionnels » (+4,6%) et des « appareils et matériels thérapeutiques » (+5,7%)                                                              1  Nomenclature  de  classification  (Classification  of  individual  consomption  by  purpose),  qui  est  structurée  de  façon emboîtée en fonctions, groupes, sousgroupes et postes © ANSD/DSECN /DSC/INPC Septembre 2010                                                                                                                 1/4           Les  prix  des  fonctions  « logement,  eau,  électricité,  gaz  et  autres  combustibles  »,  «  meubles, articles de ménage et  entretien  courant du  foyer »  et  « enseignement »  sont demeurés  stables au cours de la période sous revue Les  fonctions  « articles  dhabillement  et  chaussures  »  et  « boissons  alcoolisées,  tabacs  et stupéfiants » ont connu chacune un fléchissement de 0,2% de leurs prix au cours du mois de juillet 2010  Le  repli  des  prix  des  « vêtements  enfants  et  nourrissons  »  (1,4%),  des  « vêtements  de dessus femmes » (1,2%) et des « chaussures enfants » (0,7%) est à lorigine de celui des prix des « articles  dhabillement  et  chaussures  »  La  baisse  des  prix  des  « boissons  alcoolisées,  tabacs  et stupéfiants » est due à celle des prix du « tabac et stupéfiants » (0,2%) Le  repli  des  prix  du  « matériel  de  traitement  de  l'information  et  supports  d'enregistrement »  (1,3%) et  des  « appareils  de  réception,  enregistrement  et  reproduction »  (0,9%)  justifie  celui  des  prix  des « loisirs et culture » (0,3%) La  baisse  des  prix  des  services  de  « communication »  (2,3%)  est  liée  à  celle  des  prix  de  la « communication téléphonique » (3,1%) Au cours du mois sous revue, linflation sous jacente2 sest inscrite en hausse de 0,6% Les prix des produits locaux et importés ont progressé respectivement de 1,7% et 1,8% au mois de juillet 2010  variation de l'INPC au mois de juillet 2010Indice  global12    BIENS  ET  SERVICES  DIVERS11    RESTAURANTS  ET  HÔTEL S10    ENSEIGNEMENTS9    LOISIRS ET  CULTURES8    COMMUNICATIONS7    TRANSPORTS6    SANTE5    MEUBLES,  ARTICLES  DE MÉNAGES  ET  ENTRETIEN  COURANT  DU  FOYER4    LOGEMENT,  EAU,  ÉLECTRICITÉ,  GAZ  ET  AUTRES  COMBUSTIBLES3    ARTICLES  D'HABILLEMENT  ET  CHAUSSURES2    BOISSONS  ALCOOL ISÉES,  TABAC ET  STUPÉFIANT1    AL IMENTATION  ET  BOISSON  NON  ALCOOL ISÉES3 ,0%2 ,0%1 ,0%0 ,0%1 ,0%2 ,0%3 ,0%4 ,0%ju in10ju il1 0                                                                2  Classification  permettant  de  suivre  le  niveau  de  linflation  qui  serait  obtenu  en  dehors  des  phénomènes  perturbateurs que sont les produits saisonniers et les produits énergétiques  © ANSD/DSECN /DSC/INPC Septembre 2010                                                                                                                 2/4         )

fields.description: INDICE HARMONISE DES PRIX A LA CONSOMMATION   (IHPC) POUR LES PAYS MEMBRES DE LUEMOA (Base 100 en 2008) Dakar Septembre 2010    AVERTISSEMENT  LAgence Nationale de la Statistique et de la Démographie met à la disposition des utilisateurs lIndice Harmonisé des Prix à la  Consommation  (IHPC)  base  100  en  2008  Cet  indice  est  harmonisé  car  il  est  le  fruit  dune même méthodologie mise  en place dans huit pays membres de lUnion Economique et Monétaire Ouest Africaine (UEMOA) en 1996 et révisée en 2008 LIHPC  a  pour  population  de  référence  lensemble  des ménages  africains  de  lagglomération de Dakar Le  panier  considéré comprend 650 variétés suivies dans 1135 points dobservations Plus de 7000  relevés de prix sont effectués chaque mois La nouvelle période de base de  lIHPC est  lannée 2008 Les pondérations utilisées proviennent dune enquête  sur  les dépenses des ménages  réalisée  à  Dakar  en  2008  Dorénavant,  la  présente  publication  prend  la  relève  de  celle  de  lIHPC  base  100  en 1996  Lindice  harmonisé  des  prix  à  la  consommation  base  100  en  2008  a  enregistré  une hausse  de  0,9%  en  septembre  2010  Cette  évolution  sexplique  principalement  par  le renchérissement  des  « produits  alimentaires  et  boissons  non  alcoolisées »,  des « loisirs  et  culture »,  des  « articles  d'habillement  et  chaussures »  et  des  « boissons alcoolisées, tabacs et stupéfiants » En variation annuelle1, les prix à la consommation ont  progressé  de  3,0%  Le  rapport    des  prix  moyens  des  neuf  premiers  mois  de lannée  2010  sur  ceux  de  la  période  correspondante  de  lannée  2009  laisse  apparaître un relèvement de 0,6%  Les  prix  des  « produits  alimentaires,  boissons  non  alcoolisées »  se  sont  appréciés de  2,9%  Cette  évolution  est  liée  notamment  à  laccroissement  des  prix  des  « poissons frais  »  (+15,5%),  des  « légumes  frais  en  feuilles  »  (+9,3%)  et des  « légumes  frais  en fruits  ou  racine  »  (+3,5%),  du  fait  de  leur  rareté,  ainsi  quau  relèvement  de  ceux  des « pains  »  (+1,9%),  à  la  suite  de  la  hausse  des  prix  de  la  farine  de  blé  En  variation annuelle, les prix de la fonction ont crû de 8,9% Les  prix  des  « loisirs  et  culture »  ont  progressé  de  0,7%,  sous  leffet  de  laugmentation  de ceux  des  « forfaits  et  circuits  touristiques  composites »  (+2,8%)  En  variation  annuelle,  les prix de la fonction ont reculé de 0,5% Le  relèvement  des  prix  de  « confection  et  réparations  vêtements  hommes  »  (+2,8%)  et  de « confection et réparations vêtements  femmes » (+1,7%)  justifie celui des prix des « articles d'habillement  et  chaussures »  (+0,4%) Par  rapport  à  la  période  correspondante  en  2009, les prix de la fonction ont évolué de +0,3% Le  renchérissement  des  « boissons  alcoolisées,  tabacs  et  stupéfiants  »  (+0,3%)  est consécutif  à  celui  des  « tabacs  et  stupéfiants  »  (+0,3%)  Par  rapport  à  la  période correspondante en 2009, les prix de la fonction ont évolué de +4,4%                                                             1 Variation entre les mêmes mois de deux années consécutives © Agence Nationale de la Statistique et de la Démographie/DSECN /DSC/IHPC    Octobre 2010           1/7   Les  fonctions  « santé »  et  « biens  et  services  divers  »  ont  enregistré  chacune  une progression  de  0,2%  de  leurs  prix  en  septembre  2010,  en  liaison  respectivement  avec  celle des  prix  des  « services  hospitaliers  »  (+1,8%)  et  des  « produits  pour  soins  corporels  » (+0,6%)  En  variation  annuelle,  les  prix  des  services  de  « santé »  ont  crû  de  1,3%,  tandis que ceux des « biens et services divers » ont reculé de 3,5% Les  prix  des  services  de  « lenseignement  »  ont  enregistré  une  légère  hausse  de  0,1%  en septembre  2010,  imputable  à  celle  des  prix  de  « lenseignement  non  défini  par  niveau » (+0,5%) En variation annuelle, les prix de la fonction ont augmenté de 0,8% Les  prix  des  services  de  «  transports »  et  des  «  meubles,  articles  de  ménage  et entretien  courant  du  foyer »  sont  demeurés  stables  en  septembre  2010  En  variation annuelle,  les  prix  des    services  de  « transports »  ont  crû  de  2,4%,  tandis  que  ceux  des          « meubles, articles de ménage et entretien courant du foyer » se sont repliés de 1,0% Les  prix  des  services  de  «  logement,  eau,  électricité,  gaz  et  autres  combustibles  »  se sont  contractés  de  0,4%,  sous  leffet  dun  repli  de  ceux  du  « gaz  »  (2,9%) Par  rapport  à  la période correspondante en 2009, les prix de la fonction ont été majorés de 1,1% Le  repli  de  0,7%  des  prix  des  « restaurants,  cafés  et  établissements  similaires »  explique celui  des  prix  des  « restaurants  et  hôtels »  (0,7%)  En  variation  annuelle,  les  prix  des services de « restaurants et hôtels » ont crû de 1,2% La baisse des prix des services de « communication » (1,6%) est liée à celle des prix de la « communication  téléphonique  »  (1,5%)  Par  rapport  à  la  période  correspondante  en  2009, les prix de la fonction sont ressortis à 6,1% Au  cours  du  mois  sous  revue,  linflation  sous  jacente2  est  demeurée  stable  en  rythme mensuel  et  sest  accrue  de  0,1%  en  variation  annuelle  Les  prix  des  produits  locaux  ont  crû de 1,3%,  tandis que ceux des produits  importés se sont  repliés de 0,2% Comparés au mois de septembre 2009,  les prix des produits  locaux et  importés ont été majorés  respectivement de 3,6% et 1,5%                                                             2 Classification permettant de suivre le niveau de linflation qui serait obtenu en dehors des phénomènes perturbateurs que sont les produits saisonniers et les produits énergétiques  © Agence Nationale de la Statistique et de la Démographie/DSECN /DSC/IHPC    Octobre  2010           2/7

This month the actual prominent hotel, which was the very first worldwide regular house within Cairns, will certainly unveil the new look Porte cohere, foyer, lobby, Sugars Cane lounge, in addition to general public places, along with the extensive function undertaken towards the front facade from the hotel. http://www.sqjinyuan.net/ Gone would be the opulent gilded home windows and weighty timber balustrades which introduced the actual hotel towards the world interest in1982, to become changed through traditional stainless steel, contemporary illumination, ground in order to ceiling frameless glass, stylish wallpapers in addition to spectacular home furniture. Paul Kamsler, executive director from the Pacific Worldwide Cairns, stated the changes had been much more in tune along with today contemporary traveler, in addition to marked an exciting time for the actual hotel, allowing it to fully maximize the possible in both domestic and worldwide markets. We are right now approaching the end of our refurbishment and enhancement system, that has observed an investment within the hotel associated with about 20dollar million bucks over the last five many years, along with three quarters of that invested in the last 18 months. The actual refurbishment task, that commenced within 2008 and it has already been undertaken within six stages, continues to be integral towards the hotel strategy associated with improving guest encounter in addition to providing state of the art conference in addition to occasions services. The work has also been carried out with great care taken to preserve the actual hotel distinctive historical past, such as one the majority of iconic declaration items both over sized chandeliers which hang four in addition to a half meters in to the centre from the lobby. The actual hotel 176 guest areas have also been totally improved, along with brand new mini bar centers, bathrooms, along with brand new carpeting, curtains in addition to illumination. Cette  évolution  est  liée  notamment  à  laccroissement  des  prix  des  « légumes frais  en  feuilles  »  (+54,0%),  du  fait  de  leur  rareté,  ainsi  quau  relèvement  de  ceux  des « pains  » fields.description: LE MARCHE DE LEMPLOI A DAKAR Graphique 5 : Nombre d'emplois par tranche d'âges et selon le type 800007000060000500004000030000200001000001519ans1014ans1  Salarié secteur formel2024ansans25 293034ans4044ans3539ans2  Indépendant secteur informel5054ans4549ans5559ans6064ans6569ans7074ans7579anset +3  Dépendant secteur informel80 ans                       REPUBLIQUE DU SENEGAL  Un peuple  Un but  Une foi      MINISTERE DE LECONOMIE ET DES FINANCES  DIRECTION DE LA PREVISION ET DE LA STATISTIQUE          LEMPLOI, LE CHOMAGE ET LES CONDITIONS DACTIVITE DANS LAGGLOMERATION DE DAKAR  Résultats de la phase 1 de lenquête 123 de 2002, DPS  Mois de publication : mai 2004  AVANTPROPOS  Les résultats denquête présentés dans ce rapport sinscrivent dans un schéma détudes et de collaborations originales qui sera précisé par la suite  1  Contexte  Lun  des  principaux  objectifs  que  vise  lUnion  Economique  et  Monétaire  Ouest  Africaine  (UEMOA)  est  dassurer  la convergence  des  performances  et  des  politiques  économiques  des  Etats  membres  par  linstitution  dune  surveillance multilatérale  Pour  réaliser  cet  objectif,  lunion  doit  disposer  de  statistiques  harmonisées  et  fiables  Or,  depuis  plus  de deux décennies les systèmes statistiques nationaux des pays membres traversent dénormes difficultés liées, en partie, à :      Lirrégularité  dans  la  production  des  statistiques  de  base  du  fait  des  faibles  moyens  matériels  et  humains disponibles ; Le  manque  de  compatibilité  de  ces  statistiques  de  base  et  par  conséquent  des  agrégats  macro  économiques qui  en sont dérivés ; Les  retards  importants  dans  la  production  des  comptes  nationaux  et  lutilisation  de méthodologies  obsolètes dans ce domaine, etc Pour  remédier  à  cette  situation,  la  commission  de  lUEMOA  a  institué  un Programme Régional  dAppui  Statistique  à  la surveillance  multilatérale  des  pays  de  lUEMOA  (PARSTAT)  dont  lun  des  principaux  volets  concerne  le  Secteur informel urbain et lemploi   Ce volet a été confié à  lObservatoire Economique et Statistique dAfrique Subsaharienne (AFRISTAT)  en  collaboration  avec  DIAL  La  méthodologie  utilisée  est  celle  des  enquêtes  de  type  123  (emploi, secteur informel et demande des ménages) mise au point par DIAL  Lenquête sur les conditions de vie des ménages urbains sest greffée au volet « emploi et secteur informel » afin de tenir compte  de  la  question  de  lutte  contre  la  pauvreté  qui  constitue  lune  des  préoccupations  majeures  des  politiques  de développement actuelles Ainsi, la phase 1, dont les premiers résultats sont l'objet de cette publication, vise à donner une vue  exhaustive  des  conditions  d'emploi  de  la  maind 'uvre  Les  chefs  d 'exploitations  informelles  identifiés  lors  de  la phase 1 sont enquêtés sur leur mode de production dans la phase 2 Enfin, les modalités d'appel à la production du secteur informel par les différents agents économiques, la consommation et la pauvreté font l'objet de la phase 3  2  Objectifs spécifiques : le marché du travail et le suivi des conditions dactivité des ménages  Depuis plus dune décennie, le Sénégal sest engagé dans un processus de transition économique et politique, notamment vers  léconomie  de  marché  dune  part  et  dautre  part  la  démocratie  participative  et  représentative  que  symbolise  la décentralisation régionale et locale  Ainsi,  le  développement  du Sénégal  dans  le  cadre  dune  intégration  régionale  ne  pourrait  se  concevoir  sans  une  certaine accessibilité  à  linformation  et  une  maîtrise  des  Technologies  de  lInformation  et  de  la  Communication,  non  seulement pour les décideurs mais aussi pour les acteurs de la vie économique du pays, y compris les simples citoyens  La mise  en  place  dun  dispositif  de  suivi  de  lemploi  et  du  secteur  informel  aidera  le Sénégal  à  produire  des  statistiques pertinentes, actuelles et de bonne qualité, permettant de suivre en  temps réel lévolution de la situation économique et de mesurer  limpact  des  politiques,  projets  et  programmes  de  développement  et  de  réduction  de  la  pauvreté  Outre  les objectifs  plus  globaux  de  convergence  pour  un  développement  intégré,  le  suivi  des  questions  de  lemploi  occupe  une place  de  choix  dans  la  définition  des  politiques  économiques  Dans  un  tel  dispositif,  lenquête  emploi  vise  au  renforcement  des  outils  permettant  le  suivi  des  conditions  dactivité  des  ménages  et  du  fonctionnement  du  marché  du travail  En  effet,  dans  un  pays  où  la  majorité  de  la  population  tire  son  revenu  du  travail  dans  le  cadre  dune  politique économique  fondée principalement sur la réduction de la pauvreté, il est naturel de disposer dun dispositif permanent de suivi, intégré au système statistique national  Pour  combler  cette  lacune,  le  programme PARSTAT  a  initié  avec  la Direction  de  la Prévision  et  de  la Statistique  (DPS) du  Ministère  de  lEconomie  et  des  Finances  la  première  édition  de  cette  enquête  123  limitée  présentement  à lagglomération  urbaine  de  la  région  de  Dakar,  en  attendant  son  extension  à  dautres  villes  du  pays  et  à  la  zone  rurale Lobjectif  ainsi  visé  par  le  PARSTAT  est  de  transférer  la  méthodologie  à  la  DPS  afin  de  renforcer  le  système dinformations statistiques, notamment en ce qui concerne le secteur des ménages

fields.description: Planning of wireless networks is vital if operators wish to make full use of the existing investments. This paper deals with a practical approach of radio network planning process for efficient usage of GSM network. The key performance indicator (KPI) and drive test report of a Bangladeshi operator “Teletalk Bangladesh Limited” are used to make proposals on how operators can optimize radio resources as well as provide the required QoS to the subscribers. This study would help to plan operators to enhance coverage, improve quality and increase capacity in the days to come. ( International Journal of Communications (IJC) is an internationally refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in communications research. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )
fields.name: International Journal of Communications (IJC) A Practical Approach of Planning and Optimization for Efficient Usage of GSM Network

fields.description: Log Files are created for Traffic Analysis, Maintenance, Software debugging, customer management at multiple places like System Services, User Monitoring Applications, Network servers, database management systems which must be kept for long periods of time. These Log files may grow to huge sizes in this complex systems and environments. For storage and convenience log files must be compressed. Most of the existing algorithms do not take temporal redundancy specific Log Files into consideration. We propose a Non Linear based Classifier which introduces a multidimensional log file compression scheme described in eight variants, differing in complexity and attained compression ratios. The FELFCNCA scheme introduces a transformation for log file whose compressible output is far better than general purpose algorithms. This proposed method was found lossless and fully automatic. It does not impose any constraint on the size of log file. ( International Journal of Communications (IJC) is an internationally refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in communications research. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )
fields.name: International Journal of Communications (IJC) FELFCNCA: Fast & Efficient Log File Compression Using Non Linear Cellular Automata Classifier

fields.description: The synthesis methods of digital signals with special correlation properties are studied. It is determined that the most promising are the synthesis methods based on a group code circular orbits section that allow to generate a set of sequences with the predetermined remote properties and to algebraically build large assemblies of digital signals with multi-level function of auto- and cross-correlation. ( International Journal of Communications (IJC) is an internationally refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in communications research. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )
fields.name: International Journal of Communications (IJC) Analysis and Comparative Study of Synthesis Methods of Digital Signals with Special Correlation Properties

fields.description:
Rapid advances in information technology are impacting every aspect of human life on a daily basis. These advances have affected Institutions of Higher Education as well. Institutions of Higher Education, however, have different IT requirements. These differences are determined partly by the type of hardware and software that they use. At a time when business entities are striving to minimize costs without compromising the quality of services rendered, the choice as to what software to acquire must reflect considerations such as costs, infrastructure, equipment, management, accessibility and modernity. These are the advantages that are borne with the acquisition of a VMware View, used for the creation of a virtual desktop. The School of Law at the University of the Witwatersrand is the first School within the university to use VMware; and among the first within the Southern African region. Just as recently introduced, its impact is already being felt in different aspects – cost minimization, minimal utilization of space, efficacy, etc. Personal experiences, informal conversations with other users within and outside the university community, dictate to us the unbeatable advantages and benefits of using VMware. This paper considers the various options available for the acquisition and management of virtual desktops in Institutions of Higher Education, and highlights its advantages.
 ( International Journal of Communications (IJC) is an internationally refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in communications research. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )
fields.name: International Journal of Communications (IJC) Virtual Desktops in Institutions of Higher Education Using VMware View

fields.description:
In this paper, we consider the problem of Multiuser Detection (MUD) in Direct Sequence/Code Division Multiple Access (DS/CDMA) communication systems. The optimum detector for MUD is the Maximum Likelihood (ML) detector, but its complexity is very high and involves an exhaustive search to reach the best fitness of the transmitted and received data. Thus, there has been considerable interest in suboptimal multiuser detectors with less complexity and reasonable performance. If we look to the problem from an optimization viewpoint, what makes our work difficult is high interaction and Epistasis among variables which should be optimized. We propose to work on the problem and try to reduce its complexity instead of using more complex and powerful optimization algorithms. To do so, we analyze problem carefully and propose a new method to overcome Epistasis. In this paper, by using sign detector and longer code lengths in DS/CDMA system, a simple detector will be proposed. This method is compared with ML and two model-free optimization methods: Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) and Ant Colony Optimization (ACO) algorithms which have been used for MUD in DS/CDMA. Simulation results show our method dramatic efficiency.
 ( International Journal of Communications (IJC) is an internationally refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in communications research. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )
fields.name: International Journal of Communications (IJC) A Novel MAI Reduction Method Using Longer M-sequences for Multiuser Detection in DS/CDMA Communication Systems

fields.description:
A mobile ad hoc network (MANET) is a collection of wireless mobile nodes which have the ability to communicate with each other without having fixed network infrastructure or any central base station. Individual nodes are responsible for dynamically discovering other nodes that they can directly communicate with. Communication between nodes may be achieved by means of Route Discovery and maintenance. Because of mobility nature, discovery task is more complex. A black hole is a malicious node that falsely replies to any route requests without having active route to specified destination and drops all the receiving packets. Black Hole Attack can be easily deployed by the adversary. If these malicious nodes work together as a group then the damage will be very serious. This type of attack is called cooperative black hole attack. A neighborhood based method to detect whether there exists a black hole attack and a routing recovery protocol to set up a correct path to the true destination. We propose a complete protocol to detect a chain of cooperating malicious nodes in an ad hoc network that disrupts transmission of data by feeding wrong routing information. In this model, the nodes authenticate each other by issuing security certificate with digital signature to all the other nodes in the network. This model is capable of detecting and removing black hole nodes in the MANET also with a secured route discovery by means of an algorithm termed as endairA algorithm.
 ( International Journal of Communications (IJC) is an internationally refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in communications research. fields.description: It is well known that the B-spline filter can yield a very accurate algorithm for smoothing. In this paper, it is shown that a cubic B-spline filter can be used to improve the non-linear image enhancement method. In the non-linear image enhancement, a higher-frequency component can be predicted to solve the blurred problem of an enlarged image. This paper also presents a new three-dimensional (3-D) down-scaling scheme to subsample video data for video coding. Furthermore, a novel non-linear image-enhancement compensation algorithm with cubic B-spline filter is presented to improve the prediction of higher-frequency component and accordingly the efficiency of the 3-D down-scaling video coding. Finally, a computer simulation shows that the proposed method yields a better quality of the decoded image than other non-linear enhancement methods. ( International Journal of Communications (IJC) is an internationally refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in communications research. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )

fields.description:
A general Monte Carlo estimator for calculation of bit error rates for a class of noncoherent and differentially coherent communication systems is introduced. This estimator, by exploiting the connection between the Generalised Marcum Q-Function and Poisson distributions, is applied to the case of differential quadrature phased-shift keying over a frequency-selective Nakagami-m channel with an arbitrary power delay profile. It is confirmed that this estimator is efficient, and provides good results in practice.
 ( International Journal of Communications (IJC) is an internationally refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in communications research. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )
fields.name: International Journal of Communications (IJC) Sampling-Based Estimation of DQPSK Transmission Bit Error Rates with Nakagami-m Fading Channels

fields.description:
The Mean Square Error (MSE) or the Peak Signal to Noise Ratio (PSNR) are common distortion measures used to assess image quality. Nevertheless, they are usually chosen due to their simplicity and not their performance as they are not always suitable compared to the human observer. In this work we present a Rate-Distortion approach to color image compression based on subband transforms using perceptual optimization of the compression quality. This approach is based on minimization of the Weighted Mean Square Error (WMSE) of the encoded image, which better corresponds to the quality assessment of the human eye. The WMSE can be measured in the YCbCr color space, for which visual weights are relatively easily derived. Based on the new approach, new optimized compression algorithms are introduced using the Discrete Cosine Transform and the Discrete Wavelet Transform. We compare the new algorithms to presently available algorithms such as JPEG and JPEG2000. Our conclusion is that the new WMSE optimization approach outperforms presently available compression systems when a human observer is considered.
 ( International Journal of Communications (IJC) is an internationally refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in communications research. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )

fields.description: The modified Claus process is commonly used in oil refining and gas processing to recover sulfur and destroy contaminants formed in upstream processing. In oil refining, in addition to the typical modified Claus plant feed, i.e. H2S and CO2, NH3, CS2, and COS are also often present or formed. These contaminants pose a risk of poisoning the catalyst beds, as well decreasing the overall sulfur recovery. In this paper, effect of reaction furnace and converter temperatures on performance of SRUs is described. Then, the common ways for adjusting these important parameters are presented for a typical sulfur recovery unit. The achieved results can be useful for designing the new Claus sulfur recovery units. ( Journal of Petroleum Science Research (JPSR) is an international open-access and refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in petroleum science. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )
fields.name: Journal of Petroleum Science Research (JPSR) Effect of Reaction Furnace and Converter Temperatures on Performance of Sulfur Recovery Units (SRUs)

fields.description: Viscoelastic surfactants are very useful in various oilfield operations, such as enhancing oil recovery and hydraulic fracturing and acidification. Because of the permeability differences in the rock reservoir, a large part of the fluid injected can migrate to undesired regions. Therefore, viscous fluids are used to modify the permeability of certain regions of the rock formation. The products added to the fluids that provide this characteristic are called divergent agents. There are a large number of commercial products that can be used for this purpose, but the fluids prepared with them must have special properties. Therefore, it is essential to evaluate these products in advance. This work examines the chemical structure and physic-chemical properties of commercial surfactants to identify those with potential application as divergent agents. To do this, the rheological behaviour of the commercial formulations was tested considering temperature and pH conditions typical of reservoirs. ( Journal of Petroleum Science Research (JPSR) is an international open-access and refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in petroleum science. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )

fields.description: Thermal energy storage plays an important role in energy conservation, and can be applied in many areas. Paraffin/polyurethane foams composite with flame retardant as thermal energy storage materials were prepared by absorbing paraffin in honeycomb structure of polyurethane rigid foams. These composites provide a new energy saving materials, which can be used for building heating/cooling systems, and the composites can also enhance the thermal comfort for residents. In the composites, paraffin was used as the phase change material (PCM), polyurethane (PU) rigid foams acting as the supporting material, or as nano-structured calcium carbonate (nano-CC) and red phosphorus (RP) acting as the flame retardant. The thermal properties, such as phase change temperature and latent heat, were investigated by a differential scanning calorimeter (DSC). Chemical structure, micro-structure and flame retardant properties of paraffin/ polyurethane foams composite were determined by FT-IR, SEM and limited oxygen index (LOI) tester, respectively. The SEM results showed that paraffin was well dispersed in honeycomb structure of polyurethane rigid foams. The DSC results indicated that the composites melt at 80.3℃ with a latent heat of 25.8kJ/kg when the mass percentage of paraffin in the composites was 16.7%. The LOI results showed that nano-CC and RP decreased the flammability of the composites. ( Journal of Petroleum Science Research (JPSR) is an international open-access and refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in petroleum science. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas. Scholars from all relevant academic fields are invited to submit high-quality manuscripts that describe the latest, state-of-the-art research results or innovations. )
fields.name: Journal of Petroleum Science Research (JPSR) Preparation and Properties of Paraffin/Polyurethane Foams Composite with Flame Retardant as Thermal Energy Storage Materials

fields.description:
This paper deals with the problem of nonlinear dynamics of complex system with phase control combining phase-locked loop and automatic gain control loop. The behavior of the examined model is described by nonlinear two- and four-dimensional sets of differential equations with periodical nonlinearities. Stability of synchronous mode, bifurcations determining boundaries of domain with quality different behavior of the considered system, and oscillatory modes arising in domain where synchronous mode is unstable are studied. Results are presented using two-parameter bifurcation diagrams, phase portraits of attractors, time realizations of oscillations, and Poincare maps.

fields.description: Eccentric cementing status always occurs in the period of well completion in complex formation. Under this condition, buckling failure of casing has greater impact on normal production. According to adjacent balance criterion and higher differential equation, a determination method of buckling load for eccentric cementing casing was established. This avoids complex modeling and discretization processes when determining the critical buckling load of casing, and geometrical and physical parameters can directly be put in the formula of critical buckling load. There exists 8.3% relative error, comparing critical load from the formula with the result by using finite element method. That means the results are accurate. This method has the advantage of direct calculation and is easy for engineering applications without complex modeling and discretization processes. ( Journal of Petroleum Science Research (JPSR) is an international open-access and refereed journal dedicated to publishing the latest advancements in petroleum science. The goal of this journal is to record the latest findings and promote further research in these areas.
